### Commands

* [`create`](#create)
* [`mint`](#mint)
* [`list`](#list)
* [`transfer`](#transfer)
* [`add_uri`](#add_uri)
* [`set_did`](#set_did)

## Reference

### `create`

Functionality: Create an NFT wallet

Usage: chia wallet nft create [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -di           | --did-id          | TEXT    | False    | DID Id to use |
| -n            | --name            | TEXT    | False    | Set the NFT wallet name |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example 1 - Create an NFT wallet that is not linked to a DID: 

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft create
Successfully created an NFT wallet with id 3 on key 4288332900
```

Example 2 - Create an NFT wallet that is linked to a DID, specifying the fingerprint and name: 

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft create -f 4288332900 -di did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403 -n "DID-linked NFT Wallet"
Successfully created an NFT wallet with id 4 on key 4288332900
```

Show both of these NFT wallets:

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet show
Wallet height: 1117958
Sync status: Synced
Balances, fingerprint: 4288332900

Chia Wallet:
   -Total Balance:         0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Pending Total Balance: 0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Spendable:             0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Type:                  STANDARD_WALLET
   -Wallet ID:             1

New Name:
   -Total Balance:         1.0
   -Pending Total Balance: 1.0
   -Spendable:             1.0
   -Type:                  DISTRIBUTED_ID
   -DID ID:                did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
   -Wallet ID:             2

NFT Wallet:
   -Total Balance:         0.0
   -Pending Total Balance: 0.0
   -Spendable:             0.0
   -Type:                  NFT
   -Wallet ID:             3

DID-linked NFT Wallet:
   -Total Balance:         0.0
   -Pending Total Balance: 0.0
   -Spendable:             0.0
   -Type:                  NFT
   -DID ID:                did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
   -Wallet ID:             4
```

---

### `mint`

Functionality: Mint an NFT

Usage: chia wallet nft mint [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command                  | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port             | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint                 | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id                          | INTEGER | True     | Id of the NFT wallet to use |
| -ra           | --royalty-address             | TEXT    | False    | Royalty address |
| -ta           | --target-address              | TEXT    | False    | Target address |
| -nh           | --hash                        | TEXT    | True     | NFT content hash |
| -u            | --uris                        | TEXT    | True     | Comma separated list of URIs |
| -mh           | --metadata-hash               | TEXT    | False    | NFT metadata hash |
| -mu           | --metadata-uris               | TEXT    | False    | Comma separated list of metadata URIs |
| -lh           | --license-hash                | TEXT    | False    | NFT license hash |
| -lu           | --license-uris                | TEXT    | False    | Comma separated list of license URIs |
| -st           | --series-total                | INTEGER | False    | NFT series total number  [default: 1] |
| -sn           | --series-number               | INTEGER | False    | NFT series number  [default: 1] |
| -m            | --fee                         | TEXT    | False    | Set the fees per transaction, in XCH  [default: 0] |
| -rp           | --royalty-percentage-fraction | INTEGER | False    | NFT royalty percentage fraction in basis points. Example: 175 would represent 1.75%  [default: 0] |
| -h            | --help                        | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example 1 - Mint an NFT that is not associated with a DID: 

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft mint -i 3 -nh 14836b86a48e1b2b5e857213af97534704475b4c155d34b2cb83ed4b7cba2bb0 -u https://images.pexels.com/photos/11053072/pexels-photo-11053072.jpeg
NFT minted Successfully with spend bundle:
{
   'aggregated_signature': '0x955e7af8daabdc133b403e6339aaf8db62547bb248b506cedaa66caba69878b93db40297b92ea33d793eb966da7bb9fb0a962830d9cb979c8f92380f29208fd5db9ffb6074945df165ef59aa8910f1f1aa2dba874cfe98bfa7991e10e80a2935', 
   'coin_solutions': [{
      'coin': {
         'amount': 999989999991, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0x544366ddf25f8422c0e369eebdf7d0c06b9319c66a3225fcd59d8daed7647a5d'
         'puzzle_hash': '0x05dd4fb123b88ee430282e76beec1f486a0323d69be8dc6f0980de8675df8bb9'
      }, 
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': ''
   }, {
      'coin': {
         'amount': 1, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0xab48568ee3b109a71d1bb097da77a3c4c5eee7e9add00dee779bf62323598cc7', 
         'puzzle_hash': '0xeff07522495060c066f66f32acc2a77e3a3e737aca8baea4d1a64ea4cdc13da9'
      }, 
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': '0xffa084d00d38505206aba8b1658ab6502b6364ff8c39ab05c3d5f25984302fb1e176ff01ff8080'
   }, {
      'coin': {
         'amount': 1, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0xe961030a239afe44b11b4fcb89edb98520d32737555e90021e3b0f7ea8d05e8c', 
         'puzzle_hash': '0x84d00d38505206aba8b1658ab6502b6364ff8c39ab05c3d5f25984302fb1e176'
      }, 
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': '0xffffa0ab48568ee3b109a71d1bb097da77a3c4c5eee7e9add00dee779bf62323598cc7ff0180ff01ffffff80ffff01ffff33ffa0ab8ba18db3cf4f3a2b355a71490013f5273372760cbd991886ef3c05e1ff3ef2ff01ffffa0ab8ba18db3cf4f3a2b355a71490013f5273372760cbd991886ef3c05e1ff3ef2808080ff8080ff018080'
   }
]}
```

Example 2 - Mint an NFT that is associated with a DID. Specify a royalty of 3%:

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft mint -f 4288332900 -ra txch1cr25c46lvxf6dnpa9ej0jadf8lctxlsnk27vgjdrdhyt5qtytmkq8ceues -ta txch1qhw5lvfrhz8wgvpg9emtamqlfp4qxg7kn05dcmcfsr0gvawl3wusvd34qz -i 4 -nh fca3e8ddae9bf8dc7d4100f36d15395744650b3751420cc647fcf973243b533f -u https://images.pexels.com/photos/12051365/pexels-photo-12051365.jpeg -st 1337 -sn 42 -rp 300

NFT minted Successfully with spend bundle: 
{
   'aggregated_signature': '0xa72774284040966a3b353bde9c50d8bd393aa5d643ef1e0531d4aabf76b6b24080eb246c529747e3e914b72da7267e161732deab30ae3b79bf42c74436cd8cd2156f5ebfce02ff846db5ba4063f8e97f51e2bd0d11ef2a9c25e74fe603aa7f91', 
   'coin_solutions': [{
      'coin': {
         'amount': 999989999990, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0xab48568ee3b109a71d1bb097da77a3c4c5eee7e9add00dee779bf62323598cc7',
         'puzzle_hash': '0xff408b795e816dcef40ca081b10aa0e1cff7ff34313455e9d71be9097809582b'
      },
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': ''
   }, {
      'coin': {
         'amount': 1, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0xf1d5fed1b413415a5535e228d9b019c33b3299a51149907d796ac07b0b8cfac6',
         'puzzle_hash': '0xeff07522495060c066f66f32acc2a77e3a3e737aca8baea4d1a64ea4cdc13da9'
      },
      'puzzle_reveal': '',
      'solution': '0xffa062a3cce310029e709a76c94fa4d632d0e3c28ef3087532494a4c319c29a3ec8aff01ff8080'
   }, {
      'coin': {
         'amount': 1, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0x070f40b830d511ed9624edc7e333cf6b9ec5b22f43cd0ab80faeaecfc670b8c3',
         'puzzle_hash': '0xcd5e5004c997d7658c18001e7108fa3fa9e64af5dd416035b28ef7b9e6861f4f'
      }, 
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': ''
   }, {
      'coin': {
         'amount': 1, 
         'parent_coin_info': '0xebfab91ca3950beb014142f2ea0e1606e0ce11cfcd670931ff9a7009e0f2eddf', 
         'puzzle_hash': '0x62a3cce310029e709a76c94fa4d632d0e3c28ef3087532494a4c319c29a3ec8a'
      }, 
      'puzzle_reveal': '', 
      'solution': ''
   }
]}
```

### `list`

Functionality: List the current NFTs

Usage: chia wallet nft list [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | Id of the NFT wallet to use |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example 1 - Show NFTs from a wallet that is not associated with a DID: 

[todo this currently doesn't work, see https://github.com/Chia-Network/chia-blockchain/issues/11924]
```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft list -i 3

NFT identifier:            nft1a9ssxz3rntlyfvgmfl9cnmdes5sdxfeh240fqqs78v8ha2xst6xqf9ydhw
Launcher coin ID:          e961030a239afe44b11b4fcb89edb98520d32737555e90021e3b0f7ea8d05e8c
Launcher puzhash:          eff07522495060c066f66f32acc2a77e3a3e737aca8baea4d1a64ea4cdc13da9
Current NFT coin ID:       889b12b6d4585bb63f51cf9b4e6ac138c2042330c0f3d386d40be6a4a42b9a4a
On-chain data/info:        ((117 "https://images.pexels.com/photos/11053072/pexels-photo-11053072.jpeg") (104 . 0x14836b86a48e1b2b5e857213af97534704475b4c155d34b2cb83ed4b7cba2bb0) (28021) (28008 . 0x00) (27765) (27752 . 0x00) (29550 . 1) (29556 . 1))
Failed to list NFTs for wallet with id 3 on key 4288332900: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
```

Example 2 - Show NFTs from a wallet that is associated with a DID: 

```powershell
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet nft list -i 4

NFT identifier:            nft1a0atj89rj597kq2pgtew5rskqmsvuyw0e4nsjv0lnfcqnc8jah0slgt29g
Launcher coin ID:          ebfab91ca3950beb014142f2ea0e1606e0ce11cfcd670931ff9a7009e0f2eddf
Launcher puzhash:          eff07522495060c066f66f32acc2a77e3a3e737aca8baea4d1a64ea4cdc13da9
Current NFT coin ID:       8daa6ce105509c65a7e72e74ed5fa7c46dfbd96987727c85a9808fcf7d4d98a0
On-chain data/info:        ((117 "https://images.pexels.com/photos/12051365/pexels-photo-12051365.jpeg") (104 . 0xfca3e8ddae9bf8dc7d4100f36d15395744650b3751420cc647fcf973243b533f) (28021) (28008 . 0x00) (27765) (27752 . 0x00) (29550 . 42) (29556 . 1337))
Owner DID:                 did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
Royalty percentage:        300
Royalty puzhash:           c0d54c575f6193a6cc3d2e64f975a93ff0b37e13b2bcc449a36dc8ba01645eec
NFT content hash:          fca3e8ddae9bf8dc7d4100f36d15395744650b3751420cc647fcf973243b533f
Metadata hash:             00
License hash:              00
NFT series total:          1337
Current NFT number in the series: 42
Metadata updater puzhash:  fe8a4b4e27a2e29a4d3fc7ce9d527adbcaccbab6ada3903ccf3ba9a769d2d78b
NFT minting block height:  1118394
Inner puzzle supports DID: True
NFT is pending for a transaction: False

URIs:
   https://images.pexels.com/photos/12051365/pexels-photo-12051365.jpeg

Metadata URIs:

License URIs:
```

---

### `transfer`

Functionality: Transfer an NFT

Usage: chia wallet nft transfer [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | Id of the NFT wallet to use |
| -ni           | --nft-coin-id     | TEXT    | True     | Id of the NFT coin to transfer |
| -ta           | --target-address  | TEXT    | True     | Target recipient wallet address |
| -m            | --fee             | TEXT    | False    | Set the fees per transaction, in XCH. [default: 0] |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example: 

```powershell

```

---

### `add_uri`

Functionality: Add a URI to an NFT

Usage: chia wallet nft add_uri [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | Id of the NFT wallet to use |
| -ni           | --nft-coin-id     | TEXT    | True     | Id of the NFT coin to transfer |
| -u            | --uri             | TEXT    | True     | URI to add to the NFT |
| -m            | --fee             | TEXT    | False    | Set the fees per transaction, in XCH. [default: 0] |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example: 

```powershell

```

---

### `set_did`

Functionality: Set a DID on an NFT

Usage: chia wallet nft set_did [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | Id of the NFT wallet to use |
| -di           | --did-id          | TEXT    | True     | DID Id to set on the NFT |
| -ni           | --nft-coin-id     | TEXT    | True     | Id of the NFT coin to transfer |
| -m            | --fee             | TEXT    | False    | Set the fees per transaction, in XCH. [default: 0] |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit |

Example: 

```powershell

```

---










### `create`

Functionality: Create a DID wallet

Usage: chia wallet did create [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -n            | --name            | TEXT    | False    | Set the DID wallet name [default: None] |
| -a            | --amount          | INTEGER | False    | Set the DID amount in mojos. Value must be an odd number.  [default: 1]
| -m            | --fee             | TEXT    | False    | Set the fees per transaction, in XCH. [default: 0] |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit. |

Example: 

```powershell
// highlight-next-line
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet did create -n My_DID
Successfully created a DID wallet with name My_DID and id 2 on key 4288332900
Successfully created a DID did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403 in the newly created DID wallet

// highlight-next-line
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet show
Wallet height: 1117451
Sync status: Synced
Balances, fingerprint: 4288332900

Chia Wallet:
   -Total Balance:         0.999989999992 txch (999989999992 mojo)
   -Pending Total Balance: 0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Spendable:             0.0 txch (0 mojo)
   -Type:                  STANDARD_WALLET
   -Wallet ID:             1

My_DID:
   -Total Balance:         0.0
   -Pending Total Balance: 1.0
   -Spendable:             0.0
   -Type:                  DISTRIBUTED_ID
   -DID ID:                did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
   -Wallet ID:             2
```

---

### `get_did`

Functionality: Get the DID and Coin ID for a DID wallet

Usage: chia wallet did get_did [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | ID of the wallet to use |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit. |

Example: 

```powershell
// highlight-next-line
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\chia-blockchain> chia wallet did get_did -i 2
DID:                    did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
Coin ID:                0xe6c28c30c7dd2801a4cbfdb0e61186315ae9695dde0a75a6901c1394c3300db8
```
---

### `set_name`

Functionality: Get the DID and Coin ID for a DID wallet

Usage: chia wallet did get_did [OPTIONS]

Options:

| Short Command | Long Command      | Type    | Required | Description |
|:--------------|:------------------|:--------|:---------|:------------|
| -wp           | --wallet-rpc-port | INTEGER | False    | Set the port where the Wallet is hosting the RPC interface. See the rpc_port under wallet in config.yaml |
| -f            | --fingerprint     | INTEGER | False    | Set the fingerprint to specify which wallet to use |
| -i            | --id              | INTEGER | True     | ID of the wallet to use |
| -n            | --name            | TEXT    | True     | Set the DID wallet name |
| -h            | --help            | None    | False    | Show a help message and exit. |

Example: 

```powershell
// highlight-next-line
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\Chia\release_1.4.0\2022_06_15\chia-blockchain> chia wallet did set_name -i 2 -n "New Name"
Successfully set a new name for DID wallet with id 2: New Name

// highlight-next-line
(venv) PS C:\Users\User\Chia\release_1.4.0\2022_06_15\chia-blockchain> chia wallet show
Wallet height: 1117563
Sync status: Synced
Balances, fingerprint: 4288332900

Chia Wallet:
   -Total Balance:         0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Pending Total Balance: 0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Spendable:             0.999989999991 txch (999989999991 mojo)
   -Type:                  STANDARD_WALLET
   -Wallet ID:             1

// highlight-next-line
New Name:
   -Total Balance:         1.0
   -Pending Total Balance: 1.0
   -Spendable:             1.0
   -Type:                  DISTRIBUTED_ID
   -DID ID:                did:chia:17jvhl9z8zj6jma2uxk4mqj22p90hfpf29svlvlyalu8ksyefsvpql7f403
   -Wallet ID:             2

Connections:
Type      IP                                     Ports       NodeID      Last Connect      MiB Up|Dwn
FULL_NODE 127.0.0.1                              58444/58444 f40100b8... Jun 15 12:22:02      0.0|1.7
                                                 -Height: No Info    -Hash: No Info    -Trusted: True
```
